item.title: US-25E South at US-58 Interchange
item.description: US-25E South at US-58 West to Cumberland Gap, TN and Jonesville, VA. This is the western end of US-58.

item.title: End US-58 West at US-25E
item.description: End US-58 West at US-25E. Use US-25E south for Harrogate, TN and Tazewell, TN. Use US-25E north for Middlesboro, KY.

item.title: US-58 West Approaching US-25E
item.description: US-58 west approaching US-25E. Use US-25E north for Middlesboro, KY and Cumberland Gap National Park Visitors Center.

item.title: End US-58 West Approaching US-25E
item.description: End US-58 West approaching US-25E. Use US-25E South for Harrogate, TN and Tazewell, TN.

item.title: US-58 West - Welcome To Tennessee
item.description: Tennessee Welcomes You on US-58 west.

item.title: US-58 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-58 west. Distance to Rose Hill, Ewing, and Cumberland Gap (TN).

item.title: US-58 West at VA-70 South
item.description: US-58 West at VA-70 South to Blackwater.

item.title: US-58 West Approaching VA-70 South
item.description: US-58 West approaching VA-70 South in Jonesville.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North - Cumberland Gap Tunnel Information
item.description: US-58 West/US-421 North - Cumberland Gap Tunnel Information. Class 1 cargo through the Cumberland Gap Tunnel on US-25E North is prohibited.

item.title: US-58 East at VA-91 - Damascus
item.description: US-58 East at VA-91 in Damascus. VA-91 south joins US-58 east through Damascus.

item.title: US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North at US-23 Split
item.description: US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North at US-23 split. Turn left to continue on US-58 West/US-421 North.

item.title: US-23/US-421 North/US-58 West Approaching VA-65
item.description: US-23/US-421 North/US-58 West Approaching VA-65 to Dungannon. Continue on US-23/US-421 North/US-58 West for Duffield and Big Stone Gap.

item.title: US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North. Distance to Duffield, Big Stone Gap, and Cumberland Gap.

item.title: US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North at Bus. US-23/Bus.US-58/Bus. US-421
item.description: US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North at Bus. US-23/Bus.US-58/Bus. US-421 in Gate City.

item.title: US-23/US-421 North/US-58 West at Bus. US-23/Bus. US-421/Bus. US-58
item.description: US-23/US-421 North/US-58 West at Bus. US-23/Bus. US-421/Bus. US-58 in Gate City. Use Bus. US-23/Bus. US-421/Bus. US-58 for Gate City; continue on US-23 North/US-421 North/US-58 West to Big Stone Gap and Cumberland Gap.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North at US-23
item.description: US-58 West/US-421 North at US-23 in Weber City. Turn left for US-23 south; right for US-23 North/US-421 North/US-58 West.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North at US-23
item.description: US-58 West/US-421 North at US-23 in Weber City. Turn left for US-23 south to Kingsport (TN). Turn right for US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North to Gate City and Cumberland Gap.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North Approaching US-23
item.description: US-58 West/US-421 North approaching US-23. Turn left for US-23 south; turn right for US-23 North/US-58 West/US-421 North.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North at VA-224
item.description: US-58 West/US-421 North at VA-224 in Weber City. Turn left for VA-224 South to Kingsport (TN); right for US-58 West/US-421 North/To US-23 to Gate City.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North Approaching VA-224
item.description: US-58 West/US-421 North Approaching VA-224 in Scott County.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North - Scott County
item.description: Entering Scott County/Leaving Washington County on US-58 West/US-421 North.

item.title: US-58 West at VAS-833/To VAS-711
item.description: US-58 West at VAS-833/To VAS-711 in Washington County.

item.title: US-58 West/US-421 North - Washington County
item.description: Entering Washington County/Leaving Bristol, VA on US-58 West/US-421 North.

item.title: I-81 South - Exits 1A and 1B
item.description: I-81 south approaching Exit 1B - US-58 West/US-421 North/Gate City. Approaching Exit 1B - US-421 South/Bristol. This is the last exit in Virginia on I-81 south.

item.title: I-81 South - Exit 1B-A
item.description: I-81 south approaching Exits 1B and 1A - US-58 West/US-421/Gate City/Bristol.

item.title: I-81 South - Exit 3
item.description: I-81 south approaching Exit 3 - I-381 South/Bristol.

item.title: I-81 South - Exit 5
item.description: I-81 south approaching Exit 5 - US-11/US-19/Lee Highway.

item.title: I-81 South - Exit 7
item.description: I-81 South at Exit 7 - Old Airport Road/Bonham Road.

item.title: I-81 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-81 south. Distance to Bristol and Knoxville (TN).

item.title: I-81 South - Exit 13
item.description: I-81 south approaching Exit 13 - VAS-611/Lee Highway.

item.title: Alt. US-58 East at I-81/US-58
item.description: Alt. US-58 East at I-81/US-58 in Abingdon. Use I-81 South/US-58 West for Bristol.

item.title: US-58 West/US-11 South at I-81
item.description: US-58 West/US-11 South at I-81 North to Roanoke.

item.title: US-11 South/US-58 West Approaching I-81
item.description: US-11 South/US-58 West approaching I-81 in Abingdon.

item.title: US-58 West at US-11 - Abingdon
item.description: US-58 West at US-11 in Abingdon. US-11 South joins US-58 west to I-81.

item.title: US-58 East/VA-91 South at US-58/VA-91 Split
item.description: US-58 East/VA-91 South at US-58/VA-91 split. Merge right for VA-91 South to Mountain City (TN). Turn left for US-58 east to Independence and bike route 76.

item.title: US-58 East at VA-91 - Damascus
item.description: US-58 East at VA-91 in Damascus. Turn left for VA-91 north to Saltville; turn right for US-58 East/VA-91 South to White Top Mountain and Mountain City (via VA-91).

item.title: US-58 East at VA-91 in Damascus
item.description: US-58 East at VA-91 in Damascus. VA-91 south joins US-58 east through Damascus.

item.title: US-58 East at VAS-716
item.description: US-58 East at VAS-716 south to Backbone Rock (TN) and Shady Valley (TN).

item.title: US-58 East Approaching VAS-715 and VAS-858
item.description: US-58 East Approaching VAS-715 and VAS-858 in Washington County.

item.title: US-58 West/VA-91 North at US-58/VA-91 Split
item.description: US-58 West/VA-91 North at US-58/VA-91 Split in Damascus.

item.title: US-58 West/VA-91 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-58 West/VA-91 North. Distance to Damascus, Glade Spring, and Bristol. US-58 is the Jeb Stewart Highway.

item.title: VA-91 North at VAS-1212; Approaching US-58
item.description: VA-91 north at VAS-1212. VA-91 north approaching US-58. Turn right for US-58 East to Independence; turn left for US-58 West/VA-91 North to Bristol and Glade Spring.

item.title: VA-91 North Approaching US-58
item.description: VA-91 North Approaching US-58 in Washington County. Turn right for US-58 East. VA-91 North joins US-58 West into Damascus.
